message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $120. This price reflects its true value while allowing us to maintain a fair margin. I hope you find this offer appealing and look forward to your positive response.
